SYSTEM: ISSGC08.pdf: Página 31
©<Miembro Grupo>
32
Desktop Grids
• Resource Donors and Users
– if U ~ D => generic Grid model
– if U >> D => service Grid model
– if U << D => desktop Grid model
• Generic Grids
– Anyone can donate resources, heterogeneity, run own applications
• Service Grids
– Push Model
– Guaranteed service
– Many users: anyone can use the assigned resources for running their 
own applications
speaker: SYSTEM
